alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 05 at 1:28PM PDT until April 06 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southerly winds 35 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Shasta Valley in Central Siskiyou County, including portions of I-5 and Highway 97 and the cities of Weed, Gazelle, Grenada, Montague, and Yreka. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Electrical lines could be damaged and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
